snippet.title: State of War : Warmonger (2000) / 蓝色警戒 - Launch trailer [Steam 2018]
snippet.description:
purchase from Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/748040/State_of_War__Warmonger___Classic_2000/

Enjoy an unforgettable blast from the past with this classic real-time strategy experience. This all-inclusive bundle includes the original 22 missions from State of War (2000), and 16 additional missions from its sequel, State of War: Warmonger (2003).

FEATURES:

- Massive destruction with debris flying everywhere.
- An awesome graphics engine with numerous special FX.
- The strategic element of Air Forces delivering explosive charges to the battlefield.
- An "Advancer" unit, which can take over enemy buildings.
- Realistic natural FX like clouds, smoke and flares.
- Animated cut scenes at the start of each level.
- The best explosions ever!

Please follow us at:
http://twitter.com/cypronia
http://www.facebook.com/cypronia
https://www.instagram.com/cypronia1
